title: Can't login to league, getting errors
body:
Once I open the client and click launch, I get the following errors: 

Leagueclient.exe - bad image 
libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error

And then libssl-1_1.dll either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error

I've tried hextech repair tool and reinstalled the game 3 times, still the same error

help

I've tried deleting leagueclient.exe and then opening with lol.launcher.admin.exe and that still isn't working

replies.body:
Make sure you're following these steps exactly while the game is not running, and if that's not working shoot me the exact error that you're seeing so I can see what's different with your issue.

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png
